author: jfernan2
body:
PR description:
Fixed a bug which made that Overflows and hit rejections/error were wrongly considered as TDCFatal too

PR validation:
Tested with private Online DQM client and run 351168

Checked that runTheMatrix.py -l limited works too

backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38078
title: [DQM] Fixed filling for TDCfatal in DT Online DQM Backport124X
